code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SuggestionBubbles=_ref=>{let{onSuggestionClick}=_ref;const suggestions=[{id:'practice-interview',icon:'fas fa-microphone',title:'Practice Interview Questions',description:'Get ready for your next interview'},{id:'find-resources',icon:'fas fa-book',title:'Find Resources',description:'Career training and education'},{id:'connect-mentors',icon:'fas fa-users',title:'Connect to Mentors',description:'Build your professional network'},{id:'resume-help',icon:'fas fa-file-alt',title:'Resume Help',description:'Improve your resume'},{id:'job-search',icon:'fas fa-search',title:'Job Search',description:'Find opportunities'},{id:'career-advice',icon:'fas fa-lightbulb',title:'Career Advice',description:'Get guidance and tips'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"suggestions-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"suggestions-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Quick Actions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Choose a topic to get started"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"suggestion-bubbles",children:suggestions.map(suggestion=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"suggestion-bubble",onClick:()=>onSuggestionClick(suggestion.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bubble-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:suggestion.icon})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bubble-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:suggestion.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:suggestion.description})]})]},suggestion.id))})]});};export default SuggestionBubbles;
